item.title: Lechuck Writeup
item.description: from HackArmour # Lechuck Visiting https://challenges.hackrocks.com/lechuck, checked all storage, cookies, network requests - all clean guessed https://challenges.hackrocks.com/lechuck/flag - 404 are handled with a “Nothing to see here…” - nothing worthwhile Read prompt and tried every word as an endpoint - all 404 Dirbusted with gobuster: gobuster -fw -u challenges.hackrocks.com/lechuck/ -w ./common.txt dir | grep "(Status: 200" tried 5 different files , opened up two hints and hint #2 said use /user endpoint which yielded this message:
